document.full_text: turkish leaders have lined up to condemn the economist magazine for an editorial that urged voters to back the opposition in sunday's election, calling it part of an anti-democratic, pro-israeli campaign to weaken turkey.
document.title: turkey's leaders livid over economist article
lines_and_colors: turkish leaders have lined up to condemn the economist magazine for an editorial that urged voters to back the opposition in sunday's election, calling it part of an anti-democratic, pro-israeli campaign to weaken turkey.
